alert.note: Alert for Prince Edward (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CUMBERLAND AND NORTHEASTERN PRINCE EDWARD COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 744 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Farmville, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Guinea Mills around 805 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Kingsville, Raines Tavern, Tuggle, Reeds, Stoddert, McRae, and Hawk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
